website_summaries.verdict: Extremely portable, this mini eyelash curler is great for separating clumping lashes, as well as giving them an extra lift.
pros: Uses heat to curl and lift lashes
Doesn't pinch or break your lashes
Putting cap back on turns off the curler, so you won't waste your battery
cons: Does not come with good instructions

customer_reviews.title: This heated lash curler is meant to be used after mascara has dried ...
customer_reviews.text: It won't curl your lashes as well as a regular clamp-style lash curler but then you can't use those metal ones once you've applied mascara or else you'll end up pulling out lashes. This heated lash curler is meant to be used after mascara has dried, which I like because the wet weight of mascara usually uncurls my lashes as I apply it. The sleek, simple, all-black design is a lot more chic than the other heated eyelash curlers out there, and this one is half the price.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Should not have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on good reviews. I have very curly eyelashes and wanted a product that would straighten them. This product was given good reviews for that but unfortunately it doesn't straighten my eyelashes at all. I'm sure if you wanted to purchase this product to curl your eyelashes it would probably be ok. I'm still looking for something that will straighten my too curly eye lashes. I can't return it so I guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joani T

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time, money and excitement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive this product because I had heard from a friend it was amazing. I am extremely disappointed. The battery doesn't match up properly when the battery compartment is closed. I had to wiggle and wiggle to get the power light to come on. It did heat up very quickly after that. I used it on clean eyelashes first as directed and as demonstrated on multiple videos and it didn't work. I then tried applying my mascara first and then using the product. It doesn't matter how many different ways I try or what circumstances I try to use it under I simply does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Smeck

customer_reviews.title: I love these but they seem to not last very long
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they seem to not last very long. I keep buying them because I love them but it only lasts for about 6 months when used on a daily basis. The first one I purchased only lasted about a month and the last two have lasted around 6.
customer_reviews.author: Elle T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it every day. Only downside is it goes through battery life very very fast. I highly suggest keeping a pair of AAA batteries in your makeup bag at all times if you plan on using these.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even work new out of box
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this before and it works decently for several months before breaking. I like that it doesn't break my lashes so I just go ahead and replace it when it breaks. This time, I had bought it before my other one broke and when I went to use it today, it doesn't even work at all. And of course, it's 2 days past the return window. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeves Hiker

customer_reviews.title: The cure for straight Asian lashes
customer_reviews.text: This is the only heated curler that works on my long, straight lashes. Definitely use After you apply mascara and I run my lashes through a lash comb after to get rid of the clumps. I buy this over and over because it easily breaks.... But it's worth it plus you don't lose lashes like when you use a conventional curler.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M.

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyelash curler! Gets warm in seconds and keeps the lashes separated when using which is a PLUS! The bottom where you put in a battery comes out pretty easily so that’s the only downfall of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Loses battery life/heat too fast
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a handful of times and it dies on me. I got it to replace my Sephora version that looked exactly like this, but this is built way cheaper. I had purchased a different eyelash curler with better reviews but didn't work as well on me. The hunt is still on for a better-heated lash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: It heats great...
customer_reviews.text: and I began using with recharble batteries as I was needing a new battery every 3-4 days to achieve the same intense heat. Unfortunately, you will end up holding the base with tape (as it begins to crack at the top where the above piece locks in). Mine broke, because I was forcing the two pieces to make contact, and I used too much pressure and the curler part went flying off :(. But during the time i had it...it was amazing. Would buy again....but I am done spending so much time on lashed at the moment. Maybe later I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Morita

customer_reviews.title: there’s nothing better than this one on the market
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for over 6 years, there’s nothing better than this one on the market. Curls nicely, if mascara is good, will hold for the entire day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great. Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Read the instructions, and use it after applying mascara for better results.
customer_reviews.author: KimDula

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product though
customer_reviews.text: I'm knocking this down a star because they don't include instructions and it takes longer to curl my lashes with this one that with my other heated lash curler. My advice is this: give your lashes a few swipes, apply your mascara, and then use this again until it looks the way you want it to. It's a good product though. And my eyelashes aren't falling out occasionally​ like they did with the crimping kind of lash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Granbacka

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but delivered to a relative's house! Not happy with delivery!
customer_reviews.author: momofeight

customer_reviews.title: Not my top recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with high hopes of it being a nice alternative to the traditional eyelash curler! It worked for about a week but then stopped heating up. When it was working and heating up I did not think that it worked as well as advertised. I never could perfect the perfect curl using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! And it’s the perfect size to fit in my small makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP. Not worth it, i was so looking forward to this product. BUT it sucked, it was a super waste of time trying to curl my eyelashes. Burned my eye lid on it. Eye lashes never curled!
customer_reviews.author: Sydni

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I don’t know how it works
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Shahnawaz

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash curler works great. For the first time you put a battery in. I can use it about 3 times before I need to replace the battery. I find that to be absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Roozekrans

customer_reviews.title: Such a great makeup tool
customer_reviews.text: Such a great makeup tool. When I feel like my lashes are drooping I use this and they're perfect again. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hausman

customer_reviews.title: Great product -  if you have all day.
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to get any kind of curl- if you get one at all.
customer_reviews.author: K & C Bates

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Does not work after one or two use this is my second one and it doesn’t work either even after using high quality batteries not sure what is wrong with it
customer_reviews.author: shanlyn parsons

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Aweful, doesn’t work. Waste of money but seller did refund the cost with no need to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eye-make up tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this curler! I've been using one for well over a decade now and I keep coming back to it. My lashes stay up and since I use it after applying mascara, it also smooths out any clumps. Only con is that it does eat up batteries quickly. Just keep extra batteries handy and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: T-La

customer_reviews.title: it was a piece of shit, never worked, threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: Never heated up, after trying 3 batteries, threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me :-(
customer_reviews.text: I have incredibly short eye lashes as well as hooded lids so mascara, curlers, and anything eyelash related are out of the picture for me. I thought this would work better since it didn't require any actual clamping of the eyelashes. Didn't work for me. Had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Beats metal eyelash curlers
customer_reviews.text: The wand is either too hot or doesn't get hot enough to curl the lashes. I prefer it too hot because it does a great job of curling then. Just don't hold it to the eye or skin area for long because it IS hot!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Heated lashes are the best lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these heated curlers for years, they are life! They give you the best curled lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Beaches69

customer_reviews.title: Drains batteries after TWO (2) uses!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this product TWICE and it drained TWO (2) AAA batteries.... not a good product if I'm spending money on batteries constantly....
customer_reviews.author: K. Laureyn

customer_reviews.title: The best eyelash curler on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: This thing needs it's batteries changed FREQUENTLY and after a few months of use it breaks, and you have to get another. BUT, PROS: it's the best one out there. I've tried every single one (7 in total) and this is the only one that curls my lashes with one swoop (once hot) and keeps them curled most of the day. I have full, thin lashes, and I don't know how to use the mechanical curler. this type works amazing for me, and gives a noticeable difference in awakefullness. LOVE this product. I recommend you buy a small amount of batteries with it. You'll notice when the heat begins to decrease your curl becomes less effective.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The only downside is it goes through batteries like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Heats up pretty quick, I find ti works better if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up pretty quick, I find ti works better if you use it before and after applying your mascara
customer_reviews.author: callan

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. My friend accidentally cut out my eyelashes, so it was short.. but now i can curl it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: was expecting for it to work much better. you would have to sit there for a ...
customer_reviews.text: was expecting for it to work much better. you would have to sit there for a long time for this to actually work
customer_reviews.author: MK Chick

customer_reviews.title: heats up nicely, takes a long time to curl
customer_reviews.text: Using a traditional eyelash curler is a real challenge for me! So I decided to try this Japonesque mini eyelash curler since the price was really good and just to see if I would like it. It does heat up quickly but it takes a long time to curl.
customer_reviews.author: A. Neilan

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is not a colored situation. This is a heated eye lash curler. It doesn't get too hot, but it doesn't work too well either. The top doesn't want to stay on either. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: clare leahy

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay, but Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this type of eyelash curler. It kinda curls my eyelashes, the curl lasted maybe an hour or two. I know the non-battery powered eyelash curlers may tug on your eyelashes a little, but they work a lot better. Not impressed...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Root

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without my heated eyelash curler! It holds a curl until I take my makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE heats up fast, curls beautififullly---took away one star because of how fast it eats battery
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The curler doesn't heat up. I changed the battery twice and still no difference. My fault I threw out the packaging and can't return it. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: marion diaz

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I dont know how people can say they dont like this. Honestly if you use it properly it works AMAZING. You turn it on and let it heat up for 20-30 seconds before you use it then work from the base of your lashes up moving it slowly. I usually slowly blink letting the pressure of my blinking help move the lashes through the curler. It really works amazing well. I look like I have false lashes on today and all i used was this curler and Loreals voluminous false fiber lashes mascara. No primer or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Karin L. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This is different from anything I have ever used before. I love the way it curls my lashes. The main problem I experienced with it was the AAA battery did not last over 30 days. I finally have started detaching the battery from the curler between uses and it works great and the battery lasts much longer. Love the results, even though my lashes are still not really long or beautiful - it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: If you can get the lash curler to stay heated pretty high and not eat up the battery, this definitely does what it's supposed to. I have oriental lashes which are pretty straight, and this works great. I use it after applying mascara because otherwise, it doesn't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Esther W.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The curl lasts all day, and no more pinched eyelids from gross, mascara-encrusted rubber as in the traditional eyelash curlers. The directions say that it can be used with mascara on or off, but I recommend using it on plain lashes (pre-mascara) in order to keep it clean and hygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than using traditional curlers though
customer_reviews.text: I can feel the heat but can't really tell if it makes a big difference on my lashes. Better than using traditional curlers though.
customer_reviews.author: hchou

customer_reviews.title: Like a curling iron for eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: Curls eyelashes perfectly without pinching like with manual eyelash curlers!
customer_reviews.author: Lori R Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after reading articles about how heated eyelash curlers really help but this was worthless. It barely got warm and didn't make my lashes curl any more or for any longer than just using a regular eye lash curler.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Heated Eyelash Curler
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my mini heated eyelash curler, so I had to test it out. This product works decently, and I would definately recommend for people with short eyelashes. After using this curler, I would definately invest in a more expensive curler.
customer_reviews.author: kbrunk

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working. The wires are lose I think. The first one I bought was great - this one wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Had one in the past and loved it. This one quit working after about 4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with adjustments...
customer_reviews.text: It goes through batteries fast and I had to tape the battery compartment closed or it wouldn't heat, but other than that I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Vada A. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this product because I have very straight eyelashes. Tried it many times but never saw much difference in my I lashes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Solow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Warms up a bit but doesn't have a noticeable effect on lashes.
customer_reviews.author: janie steinberger

customer_reviews.title: A product that works whem you order one
customer_reviews.text: Did not heat up like my first one i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyelash curler. My clients are not as afraid of it as manual ones
customer_reviews.author: Helen Khealie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't get warm enough to curl my long but straight lashes. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: ... take a bit of patience they don't curl quickly like with a spring curler but I think its a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well for lashes with extensions...it does take a bit of patience they don't curl quickly like with a spring curler but I think its a lot more gently on your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best new thing I've tried
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are stick straight and was never gettting a good curl from the traditional lash curler. But I love this one. Really works well! Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: TripleMom

customer_reviews.title: It broke very easily. I did not get to use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke very easily. I did not get to use it for long. Loved the idea of the heated curler, but it was not made strong enough. The heating mechanism quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Farmer

customer_reviews.title: SO wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed in Japonesque. My daughter and I used the their traditional curler and lost the pad during a trip so I requested a replacement (because they are free replacement for life) and bought this little gadget meanwhile. Well, #1... it's been at least 3 months and we have not received the curling pad and this heated curler just doesn't curl. Japonesque, don't fail me! I was really excited about how well the original curler worked. Now, no replacement + a non-curling curler. So sad
customer_reviews.author: amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick to the medieval torture of hand helds
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is more for the manufacturer, NOT the seller. Battery lasts a couple days and the neck is flimsy making it difficult to get all my lashes up in there.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rivero Killian

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd time using
customer_reviews.text: Used literally twice and it stopped working completely. I bought brand new batteries to make sure I didn't have an old battery and it still didn't work. Unfortunate because the heat felt really good on the lashes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: This eyelash curler arrived broken. I never even used ...
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash curler arrived broken. I never even used it. Unfortunately I threw away the box when I got it and I cannot return it or else I would. I paid for nothing. Never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Schriver

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price or the outcome of using this product!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions for use! Does not work well at all. Much better curl with regular curler. Not worth the price or the time involved in trying to figure out how to use it. I do not recommend this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: Max R. Gourley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Not life changing. But it's hot enough to heat but not burn you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my mom and she says it was easy and really fun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom and she says it was easy and really fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I really like this curler
customer_reviews.text: I really like this curler. I've gone through lots of these battery operated curlers that were far more expensive but this ones pretty sturdy. I haven't managed to break it yet. Makes my eyelashes look a mile long.
customer_reviews.author: Karalisa Fritch

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Especially great for those days my lashes droop a bit due to watery eyes! It provides a quick "touch-up."
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Marrufo

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold a curl, disappointed since this is trusted brand I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Melarie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have very straight eyelashes and I use a blow dryer to heat up my tweezerman eyelash curler. I was reading about this product in a Total Beauty website that gave it a 9 out of 10 rating for success. I wasted my moneybecause it doesn't work on short and straight eyelashes. It was taking way too much time to get even the slightest curl so because it was ever so slight...I gave it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat up as much as is needed to achieve look.
customer_reviews.author: jessiecp

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay it's a good product. The battery that it comes with doesn't last long so you'll quickly need some new ones. It really does curl the lashes if used correctly.I recommend using it after applying one coat of mascara. It tends to hold the curl better. For a more noticeable look I recommended curling your lash with a mechanical curler, apply one coat of mascara, curl with heated curler and then apply more mascara. But be careful not to place it to close to your lash line because you could burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: kokie101

customer_reviews.title: Not all it should be!
customer_reviews.text: It races through batteries, doesn't get very hot and doesn't do anything different to my eyelashes than the regular old eyelash curler does. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: S. McHale

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, when it worked
customer_reviews.text: The heated eyelash curler worked a few times before it just died. Changing the batteried did not fix the problem. Have to puchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: 8Bear's

customer_reviews.title: Curl lasts, batteries do not - nor, apparently, does the curler..
customer_reviews.text: This thing does the job. I don't have to re-curl; when I go to wash my face at night, the lashes still have curl! A pretty short battery life, but to me that's a small price to pay for not cursing while pinching the dickens out of my eyelids with my old manual curler. I'd recommend it. Edited 01/14/2015: Actually, no, I wouldn't recommend it. I accidentally dropped it on the floor this morning, and now it doesn't work. At all. I got it for Christmas. And now it's dead.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Albert Wallner

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very easy to use. Only reason I'm not giving it 5 out of 5 is because it eats through batteries like no other.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. I got one & had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I got one & had to return it because it was defective. the second one I got doesn't even get warm. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: However it's annoying to clean when mascara clumps on it and yes ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros include lightweight and its small size. It heats up adequately without risk of burning your skin. However it's annoying to clean when mascara clumps on it and yes you should use it after you curl and apply mascara. Also due to the clumping I find I have to brush out my lashes afterward to fan out my lash again after heating them. Your lashes will look amazing and stay curled for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: TakeCare

customer_reviews.title: does curl...
customer_reviews.text: this sucker sucks up alot of batteries! i feel like i go through a battery every 4-5 uses! but it does curl & potentially beautifully perfect, i just haven't mastered the techniques yet
customer_reviews.author: lily phimsavanh

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected from other reviews. Nice small size to fit in purse or make-up bag. Heats up quickly which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but mine stopped working after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Clark

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to turn on
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with the ON-OFF switch. NOT easy to turn on. Have to keep pushing the ON switch around until it comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Condel

customer_reviews.title: not very effective for everyday use, takes a long ...
customer_reviews.text: not very effective for everyday use, takes a long time to get lashes to curl and curl doesn't seem to stay very well. plus you have to be wearing mascara for it to work at all. but I mainly bought this for use with eyelash extensions so the metal curler doesn't pull them out. haven't had a chance to get the extensions yet, so can't report on that, but i'm sure it will be worth the investment to have the extensions last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: JAPONESQUE Heated Mini Eyelash Curler
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little product!!! It heats up quickly and you can use it before or after you apply mascara. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard for beginners to get the hang of it...but once you do it works some serious wonders on your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I don't like crimping my eyelashes and this gives just enough curl. It's simple to use. It's the second one I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: DirtMom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work wish I would of read more comment before buying. But now I know for next time we learn.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Velasco

customer_reviews.title: This curler curls them up easily. It heats in 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: This curler really works! My lashes grow down and you can't see them very well even with mascara. This curler curls them up easily. It heats in 30 seconds. Just put on a layer of mascara then use the curler. If you want more curl, like I need, put on another layer of mascara and curl again. You just brush the curler up your lashes and hold a couple of seconds where you want more curl. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Works better on better lashes
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are short, straight and not thick. I think this is really designed for lash extensions. It works better with mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Eber-Schmid

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. The regular curler works better. Would not recommend this product to anyone. Tried several times with no success
customer_reviews.author: Cdc123

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews before buying this product. I figured it was a 50/50 chance I would like it. I followed others' tips to help maximize its use but it still sucked. I'll stick to my Japonesque Go Curl eyelash curler. I wanted to return it since I didn't like it and Amazon gave me a full refund without having to return it. Awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Trisha F.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I have stick straight lashes and had high expectations for this heated lash curler based on other reviews. Maybe my technique is wrong, but I hold the curler on the underside of my lashes and press up and hold for 20 seconds then do it again a little closer to the end of the lash and it curls but it doesn't hold even with immediate mascara application. It -does- seem to have made my lashes longer so maybe it should be marketed for that, but as a curler it doesn't work for me, :(
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: It did nothing for me. I have long lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing for me. I have long lashes, and wanted to avoid damage from traditional lash curlers. It's a toss up. Do I want curled lashes or do I want less lashes? I'll take less lashes. This did absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss TeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Get it, and never use scary crimpers again.
customer_reviews.text: Why use those scary, metal eyelash crimpers that resemble a medieval torture device when these work even better?
customer_reviews.author: M. Y. Mim

customer_reviews.title: Love this heated eyelash curler!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyelash curler makeup artist Robert Jones introduced me too. I can't use the punching kind of eyelash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Langsdorf

customer_reviews.title: eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I is a good product but now I don't need it so was kind of a waster of money. oh well
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Junk...
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Piece of junk. If I could give it less than one star, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Janalou

customer_reviews.title: I just got this and it doesn't work or heat up!
customer_reviews.text: Upset!!!@!!@! I just got this and it doesn't work or heat up! Someone better contact me fast and send another!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: It is easy and quick to use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy and quick to use. It gives my lashes the curl I like to have. It does get hot when I first put in a fresh battery. Just be careful using it. I prefer to use it after mascara has been applied.
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: Does NOTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY!! I'd leave 0 stars if possible! I read all the reviews and took a chance. Most of the negative reviews were in regards to the battery life being short so I figured I'd just take it out after each use. The battery is not the problem. The problem is it DOESNT DO ANYTHING!! No curl, no lift, nothing! Seriously...save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: katie cahill

customer_reviews.title: Great curl!
customer_reviews.text: I love how much lashes look with this eyelash curler. Normal curlers just crimp and fold up the lash line but this one actually curls it. I use this after I put mascara on and the only thing I don't like is that it takes off some of my mascara when I curl. This does make it less clumpy though, I just reapply after. With traditional curlers though, my lashes will un-curl if I reapply after the curl...but this one actually held. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

product_meta.title: JAPONESQUE Heated Mini Eyelash Curler, Black
product_meta.description: The JAPONESQUE® Heated Mini Eyelash Curler creates a sweeping, deep, natural curl for hard to curl lashes. Unlike traditional curlers that can pinch or break lashes with pressure, the Heated Mini Eyelash Curler lifts and curls the lashes with heat. Use before or after mascara application. The sleek all-in-one design is battery powered, slipping neatly into your pocket or purse.
